mission_data.mission_description: The system has been targeted for conquest...and the enemy will never stop.^Features endless waves and variable upgrade options.^Multi-ship compatible; ship, name, & level selectable.^By Neal Schlein, for Artemis 2.7.5 (version 1.3)

folder_arme.name: GM Testing Buttons and Mission Message

event.name: Message and GM Buttons Created
event.incoming_comms_text: Priority Alert!^This system has been targeted by enemy forces as a "must-take" objective. This is being backed with a full committment of their combined fleets, and a new attack which is destabilizing local space.^^Evacuation procedures are underway; at present, you are the sole ship available for defensive operations. ^^This is a suicide assignment. Your goal is to defend the station and hold back enemy forces for as long as possible. Expect ever-increasing levels of enemy intrusion. ^^Command will be able to provide you with some support beween each enemy wave. Choose wisely.^^Good luck. The poets will write of you.

event.name: Enemies Defeated
event.incoming_comms_text: Select Upgrade

event.name: Pressed Energy Recharge
event.incoming_comms_text: Extra energy available.^^End Transmission

event.name: Pressed Shield Boost
event.incoming_comms_text: Shield Tune-up Complete (20 points)^^End Transmission

event.name: Pressed Speed Boost
event.incoming_comms_text: Thrusters cleaned and upgraded: 5% effeciency increase.^^End Transmission

event.name: Bonus Maneuver Boost
event.incoming_comms_text: Manuevering jets cleaned and upgraded: 2% effeciency increase.^^End Transmission

event.name: Bonus Station Stocks
event.incoming_comms_text: This is DS3. We have recieved authorization to release significant additional stocks for your use.^^Available stores have increased by:^5 Mines^5 Emps^5 Nukes^5 Homing Torpedoes^5 P-Shocks^5 Probes^5 Tags^5 Fighters

event.name: Bonus Heavy Weapons
event.incoming_comms_text: My interns located some misplaced ordinance and have transferred it to the loading bay.^^We have gained:^2 Mines^2 Emps^2 Nukes^2 Homing Torpedoes^2 P-Shocks^3 Probes^4 Tags

event.name: Bonus Coolant
event.incoming_comms_text: Your Chief Engineer has been authorized to access the ship's emergency reserve coolant.^^Hope it helps.

event.name: Bonus Allied Ship
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Alamo 1.^We heard you might need some assistance.^^Just tell us what to do.

event.name: Bonus Allied Ship
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Captain Mcleod of the Ringhold 2, reporting with a volunteer crew.^^We couldn't let the braggarts on the Alamo steal all the glory.

event.name: Bonus Allied Ship
event.incoming_comms_text: We're here to help stem the enemy tide. ^Just give us some guidance.

event.name: Bonus Allied Ship
event.incoming_comms_text: We're here to protect the evacuation--but we're not interested in sacrificing ourselves.

event.name: Bonus Allied Ship
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Acting Commander Byron.^I have a green crew here. They're scared stiff. Our entire command staff was lost in a battle three days ago; I'm a medical officer not a combat veteran. We're going to need some serious direction.

event.name: Bonus Allied Ship
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Captain Belroc of the Lone Howler.^^Eaton Command got your distress message. We're here to lend a hand, and collect any overdue library books; fines will be forgiven for those who can provide proof of death.^^Oh...and our chief Engineer, Greybeard, says "ARGGH!" Not sure what that's about, to be honest.^^Also...if you like this mission and survive, please let the Eaton Library staff know.

set_ship_text.name: Lone Howler
set_ship_text.hailtext: What can we do for you? Oh yes--return your library books, or I'll tell my teenage pilots to dock on YOUR ship!

event.name: Exit Evac 1
event.incoming_comms_text: This is Evac 1.^We have successfully jumped to safety with 75 refugees. We'll unload and come back shortly.^^Keep that transit corridor clear!^(BONUS: Shield Enhancement and 100 Energy)

log.text: Evac 1 escaped with refugees aboard. 75 lives saved, total of |Rescued|.
Evac 1 destroyed with refugees aboard. 75 lives lost.

event.name: Proximity to Station Evac 1
event.incoming_comms_text: We are loading personnel and equipment now...keep the enemy away from us!

set_ship_text.name: Evac 1
set_ship_text.hailtext: We are clearing equipment and personelle from the station. Keep the transit lane clear!

event.name: Dona Paz Mine Deploy
event.incoming_comms_text: SOS! SOS! This is the Dona Paz! We have 800 people aboard and are-- ^^(TRANSMISSION LOST)

log.text: Dona Paz destroyed with over 800 souls and a full load of weaponry aboard.

event.name: Exit Paz
event.incoming_comms_text: This is the Dona Paz.^We have successfully jumped to safety. We'll unload our cargo and come back for another run.^^Keep that transit corridor clear for us!^^(BONUS: Shield Enhancement and 200 Energy)

log.text: The overloaded 'Dona Paz' safely returned to Eaton Sector with 835 refugees...and a load of weapons for the black market. Total rescued: |Rescued|

set_ship_text.name: Dona Paz
set_ship_text.hailtext: We have women and children aboard! Get us through!

event.name: Proximity to Station Paz
event.incoming_comms_text: We are loading up now...keep the enemy away from us!

event.name: Log Station Destroyed
event.incoming_comms_text: DS 3 has been destroyed; all remaining souls are presumed lost.^^We need more time to arrange defenses. Your orders are to continue defending the system. Take out as many of them as you can!

big_message.title: Game Over!
big_message.subtitle1: The transports saved |Rescued| souls. Good work.

log.text: Before the defense fleet was finally destroyed, |Rescued| people were transported off of DS3. The fleet survived against |Round| waves of enemies.
